definition: variant of 閹|阉[yan1]/to castrate/variant of 淹[yan1]/to delay

sentences.english: Yes, yesterday was the my pay-day; I pay you the payment today.
sentences.chinese: 是地，昨天是咋噠發薪日，俺今天付給你報酬。

sentences.english: On weekends, I'll catch the morning movie for my visual enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 在週末時，俺都去看早場電影，享受視覺饗宴喜悅。

sentences.english: I am the democratically elected leader of a freedom-loving democracy. We are a compassionate society.
sentences.chinese: 俺是熱愛自由的民主國家的民主選舉出來的領袖。

sentences.english: I cannae understand a word, even wit' tha magic o' Thor.
sentences.chinese: 就算使上托爾的魔法，俺也一個字都不懂。

sentences.english: Did it again tonight too, " Blindy said happily."
sentences.chinese: “今晚俺又摸了一次，”盲漢得意地說。

sentences.english: I'd like to buy a medium-sized cloisonne vase with alight blue background.
sentences.chinese: 俺想買一箇中等尺寸的景泰藍花瓶，底色要淡藍的。

sentences.english: Irll stay at home unless Irm invited.
sentences.chinese: 除非俺獲邀請，否則偶就留在家裏。

sentences.english: Me hammer is always ready, lads.
sentences.chinese: 俺的戰錘隨時待命，夥計。

sentences.english: I enjoyed the show very much----it was really fun .
sentences.chinese: 俺很愛好這場上演，無比有趣。

sentences.english: I must have a reason for a certain hypothesis.
sentences.chinese: 俺必須爲一種真設覓到理由。

sentences.english: I have been told that Goethe said that architecture is frozen music.
sentences.chinese: 俺一直聽人家說，歌德講，建築是凝固的音樂。

sentences.english: I am writing this letter Apply your company's recruiting assistant manager position.
sentences.chinese: 俺寫此信應聘貴公司招聘的經理助理職位。

sentences.english: You know what my services are worth better than I do .
sentences.chinese: 對於敝人作工的價值您比俺更清楚。

sentences.english: OBD:I cannae go any faster, lad, these explosives be delicate.
sentences.chinese: 俺沒法再快了，小子，這些炸藥很嬌貴。

sentences.english: How will I finally be returning' ta me beloved dwarven homelands?
sentences.chinese: 俺最後會怎麼回到俺心愛着的矮人家鄉？

sentences.english: How will I finally be returning' ta me beloved dwarven homelands?
sentences.chinese: 俺最後會怎麼回到俺心愛着的矮人家鄉？

definition: (modal final particle similar to 呢[ne5] or 啦[la5])
mile (unit of length equal to 1,609.344 m)/old form of modern 英里[Ying1 li3]
I/me/my/(often used in early vernacular literature)
baby/small child/(arch.) slave among ethnic minorities
my old mother/I, this old woman/my old lady (colloquial)/maternal grandmother/midwife
dialectal equivalent of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
